commit.message:
re PR bootstrap/4020 (Shell script syntax errors in gcc make files)

2001-11-18  Craig Rodrigues  <rodrigc@gcc.gnu.org>

	PR bootstrap/4020
	* mklibgcc.in: Add missing semi-colons.
	* Makefile.in: Same.

From-SVN: r47154

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2001-11-18  Craig Rodrigues  <rodrigc@gcc.gnu.org>
+
+	PR bootstrap/4020
+	* mklibgcc.in: Add missing semi-colons.
+	* Makefile.in: Same.
+
 Sun Nov 18 16:47:00 2001  Richard Kenner  <kenner@vlsi1.ultra.nyu.edu>
 
 	* expr.c (expand_expr, case VAR_DECL): Update alignment of DECL_RTL

@@ -2723,7 +2723,7 @@ install-info: doc installdirs lang.install-info
 	    for f in cpp.info gcc.info cppinternals.info; do \
 		if [ -f $(infodir)/$$f ]; then \
 		  install-info --dir-file=$(infodir)/dir $(infodir)/$$f; \
-		else true; fi \
+		else true; fi; \
 	    done; \
 	  else true; fi; \
 	else true; fi;
@@ -3124,7 +3124,7 @@ unstage1 unstage2 unstage3 unstage4:
 	      mv $$stage/$$i/* $$i/. 2>/dev/null; \
 	    else \
 	      mv $$stage/$$i .; \
-	    fi \
+	    fi; \
 	  done \
 	fi ; \
 	rm -f $${stage}_build $${stage}_copy ;\

@@ -335,7 +335,7 @@ done
 
 echo 'stmp-dirs: force'
 echo '	for d in '"$dirs"'; do \'
-echo '	  if [ -d $$d ]; then true; else '$mkinstalldirs' $$d; fi \'
+echo '	  if [ -d $$d ]; then true; else '$mkinstalldirs' $$d; fi; \'
 echo '	done'
 echo '	if [ -f stmp-dirs ]; then true; else touch stmp-dirs; fi'
